chunk:
KPS Essentials Hydralux Extreme Moisture (2020 formulation)

Brand: KPS Essentials

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water, *Punica Pranatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, *Argania Spinosa (Argan), *Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, *Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba Seed) Oil, Steric Acid, *Ilex paraguariensis leaf (Yerba Mate) Extract, C14-22 Alcohols, C12-20 Alky Glucoside, Sodium Hyaluronic Acid, *Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Ethyl Lauroly Arginate HCI,

Directions: Boost your skin's hydration. Perfect for dry skin or cold/winter seasons or travel. Increase water reserves and rebuild your skin's natural moisture barrier. Use alone or over the Renu Face Cream for an extra dose of moisture. The perfect combination to reveal healthy, hydrated skin.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
